text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP29684-5 (RAD)
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP7839-6 (PATH)
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP7796-8 (ENDO.GI)
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP29693-6 (Lab)
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP29708-2 (Card)
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP31795-1
  • Include codes from http://loinc.org where concept = LP7819-8 (MICRO)
